content: {A笑眯眯}My Planette has grown even better, and the sky we share seems to be getting closer too. Here, this <style=Highlight>{奖励名称}</style> is for you, baa.
info: NPC成长等级-2级演出-12绵朵莉_绵朵莉

content: This is the plushie that came to my mind, {A想象}when I looked at the clouds in the sky...{短暂停} It'll make your home all floofy too, as a decoration.
